venue.name: Hess Gas - Intersection Mass Pike, Rt 128, and Commonwealth Ave

item.description:
The ultimate Cape Cod Tour! We will scoot down the superslab to catch the Marthas Vineyard Ferry (approx $60 round trip paid directly to them). A full day scooting around Marthas Vineyard. If you have ever been to Marthas Vineyard you know that scooters were made to scoot the Island. Reservations for scooters are not needed.

We will stay over on Cape Cod (not too far from Hyannis) then tour the cape! Rt 28 to Chatham the to Provincetown ....

Doug will lead the tour...
item.name: Cape Cod Overnight - Scooting Around Marthas Vineyard then Cap Cod !
